title: Subtle Sparkle: Diamond Teardrop Studs
materials: brilliant-cut Diamonds. Showcasing a signature Hyderabadi Polish for lasting lustre.
features: Delicate teardrop (chandbali) design featuring a floral diamond pattern, set in a prong setting for maximum brilliance. The openwork design adds a touch of ethereality and grace.
colors: Warm yellow gold complemented by the dazzling white of the diamonds.
occasions: or adding a touch of sparkle to traditional attire. Suitable for functions like Seemantham or a contemporary cocktail party.
description: A classic design with a modern twist, these diamond studs are handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail. The diamonds are carefully selected for their brilliance and clarity. These earrings are versatile and timeless. The fine craftsmanship will ensure it becomes an heirloom.
